Instrument_PDS3.instrument_desc:
Instrument Overview =================== The 'IHW INFRARED SPECTROSCOPY DATA' pseudo-instrument is used to identify data submitted as part of the International Halley Watch (IHW) Infrared Studies Network (IRSN) Spectroscopy sub-net. A number of different instruments were used at several observatories to collect the data. The actual system used for any specific data product is identified in the product label.
A list of observing systems contributing to the IR spectroscopy archive follows.
